Package comp3111.popnames

Class NamePopularityQuery

java.lang.Object
comp3111.popnames.NamePopularityQuery
public class NamePopularityQuery
extends java.lang.Object
Task 2 (Reporting 2) Class that generate a report on the popularity of a particular name over a given period

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  NamePopularityQuery.NamePopularityQueryDataRow
    Task 2 Inner class storing popularity data of a name in a year for constructing report table

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    the year of the start of the queried period
    private int topYearRank
    the highest rank of the name in the period
    private java.util.ArrayList<NamePopularityQuery.NamePopularityQueryDataRow> topYears

  • Constructor Details

    • NamePopularityQuery

      public NamePopularityQuery​(java.lang.String inputName, java.lang.String inputGender, int inputStartYear, int inputEndYear)
      Construct a NamePopularityQuery object for processing the popularity data of the queried name
      Parameters:
      inputName - name to be queried
      inputGender - gender of name to be queried
      inputStartYear - start of the period to be queried
      inputEndYear - end of the period to be queried

  • Method Details

    • getNamePopularity

      private void getNamePopularity()
      Get the popularity data of the queried name of each year in the period, and store the data in the current object. Populate the array storing popularity data of each year in the period. Process the highest rank the name achieved in the period, and populate the array storing the year the name achieved that rank

    • getSummary

      public java.lang.String getSummary()
      Get the summary text of the queried result of the popularity of a name

      the summary text
